oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robbins Brothers Circus Parade, Nashville, Tennessee, 1938 August 29
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Horseback riders and entertainers of the Robbins Bros. Circus on parade going back to the show grounds, August 29th, 1938. The circus company played the lot across Fourth Avenue from the Fairgrounds (which locally was known as the “Murray Chair Company lot.” Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Parades--Tennessee--Nashville; Circus--Tennessee--Nashville
